data.name: Notice3
data.description: All-purpose script for an online classifieds website. On the backend side, Symfony is used. On the client side, the script uses VUE and styles from Twitter Bootstrap 5. Perfect for a large advertising portal. Script intended for professional use.

data.name: MotoNotice
data.description: An advertising script dedicated to the automotive industry. It allows you to create a local, national or international website. It is characterized by a very extensive functionality and easy operation for the administrator and users.

data.name: Demoty2
data.description: The Demoty2 script allows you to create your own website with demotivators and memes. Script is based on the Twig template system and the CSS Bulma framework.

data.name: Holmes2
data.description: Script for a portal with a real estate database. It is perfect for running small and large real estate listings for sale, rent or exchange. With Holmes2 you can create a local, national or international portal.

data.name: Cuadro
data.description: Cuadro is a script that allows you to create a website with pictures, photos and videos from the web. It allows users to upload graphic and MP4 files and attach videos from Youtube, Vimeo and DailyMotion.

data.name: Festa2
data.description: The Festa2 script allows you to create a website with the accommodation database. It supports automatic payments in Dotpay, Przelewy24 and PayPal. It is integrated with Google Maps (via API) and reCAPTCHA.

data.name: JobNotice
data.description: JobNotice is a modern script for a website with job offers and advertisements. It allows you to create a local, national or international website and earn passive money on ads and on adding and promoting classifieds.

data.name: Corta
data.description: With the Corta script you can create your own simple website to shorts links - to turn long URLs into short and easy to remember. This will make them more convenient to post on various social media and messenger apps.
